headline: BathyBeacon Design Document V2
description: A formalized design document for the BathyBeacon project — a passive, non-disruptive deep-sea observational platform. This version articulates the mission’s ethics, method, and technical scope.
whyItMatters: This document reframes what it means to reach out across an ecological boundary. It trades control for invitation, and maps the technical with humility. Science becomes ritual.
articleExcerpt: The BathyBeacon Project aims to explore deep-sea biological environments through a novel, non-disruptive passive beacon system...
sourceFragments: Utilize precision-tuned artificial bioluminescence to attract and observe deep-sea life.
Gathering invaluable behavioral data, including the significance of silence (non-responsiveness).
